actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to provide the Secretary of Agriculture with flexibility in the imposition of marketing penalties for peanuts.

summary.text: Amends the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1938 to authorize a reduction in the amount of any penalty imposed for a particular violation of a marketing quota for peanuts, if such violation was unintentional or unknowing, and a reduction of such penalty would not impair the effective operation of the peanut price support program.

titles.title: A bill to provide the Secretary of Agriculture with flexibility in the imposition of marketing penalties for peanuts.
